title: Amazing find! 2 bed/ 1 Bath home available!
posting_body: A PERFECTLY-PRICED house with abundant amenities.
This home has 2 modest bedrooms and 1 well-appointed bathroom.
Why rent when you can buy?
Check out this cozy single-family home in the heart of the city.
An option to purchase at the end of the term will give you the financial freedom that comes with owning a home.
Call or text us by clicking the reply button.
All credit scores are welcome to apply.
